short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that allows you to bookmark all open tabs with one click. Choose to save to a new or existing bookmark folder.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bookmark All Tabs is a simple and convenient Chrome extension that allows you to bookmark all open tabs with just one click.

Key Features:
1. Save Tabs to Folders: Choose to save tabs in a new bookmark folder or an existing one.
2. Auto-Title Folders: Automatically title the folder with the current date, time, or the most common words found in the tab titles.
3. Access Recent Folders: Select a recently opened bookmark folder for quick saving.
4. View and Select Tabs: View all open tabs in a list and pick the ones youâ€™d like to bookmark.
5. Copy URLs and Titles: Copy URLs or titles of selected tabs to the clipboard for easy sharing or organization.

How to Use:
1. Open the Extension: Click the extension icon in your browser.
2. Choose a Folder: Select an existing bookmark folder or create a new one.
For new folders, you can auto-title them with the current date, time, or common words from tab titles.
3. Bookmark Tabs: Once a folder is selected, click "Bookmark All Tabs" to save the tabs.

We hope you find Bookmark All Tabs to be a useful and time-saving extension. Thank you for using it!
